rationale: This table disaggregates Amazon's revenue by product/service lines including Online stores, Physical stores, Third-party seller services, Subscription services, Advertising services, AWS, Other, and includes a Consolidated total revenue row. It matches the preferred product/service dimension and provides granular revenue breakdown for recent fiscal years (2023, 2024). It is more granular than segment-level tables and includes total revenue, fulfilling all critical constraints.
